discover.instruction: Read about someone's past life. Notice 'used to'.
discover.instruction_ru: Прочитай о прошлой жизни человека. Обрати внимание на 'used to'.

content.text: My life has changed a lot! When I was young, I <highlight>used to live</highlight> in a small village. I <highlight>used to walk</highlight> to school every day. I <highlight>used to play</highlight> outside with my friends. We <highlight>didn't use to have</highlight> computers. I <highlight>used to read</highlight> a lot of books. My grandmother <highlight>used to tell</highlight> me stories. Now everything is different. I live in a city. <highlight>Did</highlight> you <highlight>use to live</highlight> somewhere else?
content.question: What does 'used to' tell us about? The past or the present?
content.question_ru: О чём говорит 'used to'? О прошлом или настоящем?

theory.title: Used to - Past habits and states that are no longer true
theory.title_ru: Used to - Прошлые привычки и состояния, которые больше не актуальны

points.rule: Used to + base verb (for past habits/states)
points.rule_ru: Used to + базовый глагол (для прошлых привычек/состояний)
points.example: I used to smoke. (I don't smoke now)

points.rule: Meaning: Something was true before, but not now
points.rule_ru: Значение: Что-то было правдой раньше, но не сейчас
points.example: She used to live in Paris. (Now she lives somewhere else)
I didn't use to like vegetables. (Now I do)
Did you use to play sports?

notice.instruction: Find all 'used to' structures. What changed from past to present?
notice.instruction_ru: Найди все структуры 'used to'. Что изменилось с прошлого до настоящего?

tasks.text: When I was a child, things were different. I used to wake up early for school. I used to have short hair. I didn't use to drink coffee - I hated it! My father used to work in a factory. Now he's retired. We used to have a dog named Max. He used to follow me everywhere. Did you use to have pets? My mother used to cook every day. Now we often order food. Life used to be simpler, I think.

find.now: doesn't wake up early for school

find.past: father used to work in a factory
Did you use to have pets?

notice.reflection_question: What's the difference between 'I used to live' and 'I lived'?
notice.reflection_question_ru: В чём разница между 'I used to live' и 'I lived'?

exercises.instruction: Complete with used to, didn't use to, or did...use to.

sentences.sentence: I ___ (have) long hair when I was young.
She ___ (not/like) vegetables, but now she loves them.
They ___ (live) in London before moving here.
He ___ (not/drink) coffee, but now he can't live without it.
We ___ (go) to the beach every summer.
I ___ (be) shy, but I'm more confident now.

questions.sentence: I ___ play tennis, but I stopped.
He ___ work here, but he retired.
They ___ live in a small apartment.

sentences.incorrect: I didn't used to like coffee.
sentences.correct: I didn't use to like coffee.

produce.instruction: Write about how your life has changed.
produce.instruction_ru: Напиши о том, как изменилась твоя жизнь.
prompts: What did you use to do as a child?
What didn't you use to like?
What habits did you use to have?
produce.example: My life has changed a lot. When I was a child, I used to live in a small town. I used to walk to school with my friends. I didn't use to have a phone. I used to play outside every day. I didn't use to drink coffee - I hated it! Now I drink coffee every morning. My town used to be quiet. Now it's a busy city.

texts.title: Childhood Memories
texts.content: I used to love summer holidays. We used to go to our grandparents' village. I used to play in the river. My grandmother used to make delicious cookies. I didn't use to like vegetables then. My brother and I used to catch butterflies. We used to stay up late. Life used to feel endless and magical.

texts.title: Before and After
texts.content: Before I got this job, my life was different. I used to wake up late. I didn't use to have much money. I used to eat fast food a lot. I didn't use to exercise. Now everything is different. Did you use to be different too? We all used to have different lives.

texts.title: Old Technology
texts.content: Technology has changed so much! We used to use cassette tapes. We didn't use to have smartphones. I used to wait for my favorite TV show. We didn't use to stream movies. People used to write letters. We used to rent videos from stores. Did you use to have a Walkman? I used to love mine!

texts.title: School Days
texts.content: My school days were fun. I used to sit in the back row. I didn't use to like math. My best friend used to help me with homework. We used to eat lunch together. I used to be afraid of the principal. I didn't use to study much, but I passed!

texts.title: City Changes
texts.content: My city used to be very different. There didn't use to be a metro. People used to use buses only. There used to be more trees. There didn't use to be so many cars. The air used to be cleaner. Did it use to be better? I think so. But we used to have fewer opportunities.

used to live

didn't use to like
